pages.text: Become mighty and powerful with the power of blood, but not quite Blood Magic.

To get started, mine some Dark Ore to obtain Dark Gems.  After that craft a Darkened Apple and feed to to one of your favorite animals.  When it experiences a greusome demise an anomaly will appear, throw a normal book in quickly and you will have the guide book in your possession now!

Evilcraft has quite a lot of blood-based machinery to help you with your crafting needs - even custom magic flying brooms! You can infuse certain things to make them stronger, and even use blood to repair items.  It also adds in a variety of monster spawns that are guaranteed to make your life easier, but don't despair.  Because you can transform biomes as you please now.
